body: Currently real service doesn't accepts activity and workflow task tokens across retries. But the TestWorkflowService [includes only workflow and activity id in it](https://github.com/temporalio/temporal-java-sdk/blob/538557e55d27635bd08e507bc4b595c19e20223a/src/main/java/io/temporal/internal/testservice/TestWorkflowService.java#L544).

comments.body: We don't include retry count into the token, which is why previous activity retry can complete next one in the test service. To be consistent with the real service we want to fix this.

title: TestWorkflowService: Make tokens unique across retries
